channel.title: This Is For All The People Who Need Some Help
channel.description:
Tutorial Contents When a search engine fails try here
Sever Setup/ PortForwarding
Must Read guides How to Start a Server By The Soul Protocol documentation By oksuper_
Setting up [508]: High Definition setup Pics+Explained By tonypker13 Setting Up RS2D(v) on Windows and a few error fixes. By m.dog311 How to USE rs2dv. By Hidendra Setting up java (by io9, great tutorial) By io9
PortForwarding Portforwarding Guide - Linksys {Easy} By Bmaw Can't portforward? Look here! Easiest way possible. By `Lewk_ How to Give Yourself a Static IP Adress [Portforwarding Help] By David2
Hosting/Management Host a Server on Linux (Ubuntu) By Fat_Cookies [How to Host a Server via iTouch] By fatwallet Maintaining a respected server. By Gnarly... Custom Server Status Page By Newty
Other Code Snippits
317 Tutorials Complex How To Add Sounds On A 317 By wolfs goal [317] How to Change Rotation On a Npc [317] By _James_scape Jail - Saves + Door By Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
Other JS5 information By oksuper_ Login protocol of Old Engine By oksuper_ Player Updating Procedure By oksuper_ PickPocketing base - 317 By primadude Players Online! By counter4545 [Any] How to make Objects only load for specific areas! By Tatemo
508 Tutorials Basic [508] Various Beginner Tutorials [508] By Jc22493
Complex Adding Skills [508]: A good fishing base By primadude
Other [508] Fixing Bulby PVP Bug [508] By justinxg27 [508] Adding a Random Event to Stop Auto-Clickers [508] By davidi2 Reference Tables of the New Engine By oksuper_ 508 Login protocol By oksuper_ Full destroy Item in a 508 By primadude [508]Handing Packet 40: Item on Item (Inventory) By Lin
Specialised Server Bases Deltascape How to add a fully working report system By Si Force
Other [Project Czar] Disabling magic on NPCs with 0 HP By Kihomura [RS2E]: Player Saving and Loading to a MySQL Database. By Hidendra Understanding Emulous - Tutorial 1 - Updated FAQ By Efilite Efficient quest progress saving. By SonGoku
[525] Ban/IpBan/Mute/IpMute/GUI By `Trey
Java Java Coding Conventions -- Please read.. By Sun Microsystems The Most Common Java Errors - Fix it my way! By burnt w pwnt
Mapdata... what exactly is it? Bu oksuper_ The Ternary Operator By primadude
Switch Statements Explained By Jc22493 Switch Statements, Arrays Explained! [w/ Examples of Priavte Server Code] By Mazeingmaze
Learning about Variables By Kihomura Learning about Parameters By Ensure_ How to Manage 'If-Else' Blocks (Revised!) By meiscooldude
Using the System timer instead of 'processing' them. By primadude How to use the util Timer. By Gnarly...
TreeSet || TreeMap By xpatx Using command-line parameters By _ikram Using the for/for each loop By The Soul HashMaps By xpatx xStream - Basics By xpatx Understanding and Making a Binary Search Tree By meiscooldude MySQL connections -- Example: login Text By Sonis Brand New NPC Dialog Function - sendDialog() By Jeremy Yak
Loading Objects from a CFG File By Lin Loading various things to server from text files By _ikram Automatic configuration loading from a properties file By SonGoku
Java Databse Connectivity; Add mysql to your server! By wales 00 Asynchronous database queries By beta_ Smf integration. By beta_ Server Icons... / System tray program Icons. (picture example) By quest rs
On date of edit, there are 73 Topics in the Tutorial Section. (1 Dead Link... ) Please reply if there are any problems with links etc.

item.title: This Is For All The People Who Need Some Help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. No lists allowed unless approved by staff
  2. No links? How will they find them if they cant find them via search bar?[quote=“neon091, post:1, topic:307717”]When a search engine fails try here[/quote]
  3. Don’t ask for rep.

Read full topic
item.source: This Is For All The People Who Need Some Help

item.title: This Is For All The People Who Need Some Help
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

xxpkpurexx:

kk wait lemme c ur a great poster ill rep u?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 08:05:34 pm[/size][hr]i didnt get it?

You can’t rep, and you’ll never be able to, as you post unhelpful threads. Nobody in their right mind would give you reputation when you don’t help anyone.

Also, Neon, great job.

Read full topic
